author: hangleang.eth
content: a question to <@&1367819082019377202> devs: do you re-subscribe to gossip topics between BPO forks, given the fork digest changed?

author: nc1234
content: Yes, fork digest is part of the topic strings in the form of `/eth2/ForkDigestValue/Name/Encoding`, so we need to unsubscribe the old ones and subsubscribe the new ones.

author: hangleang.eth
content: thank you for confirming

author: agnxsh
content: Yes

author: barnabasbusa
content:
QQ, do client teams expected to work with older forks?

E.g will every client still support syncing from phase0 and doing fork transition altair/bellatrix etc.

author: __flcl
content: It sounds like archive node support via re-execution of every block, which is still relevant

author: hangleang.eth
content: What is the expected behavior? StatusV1 deprecation immediately after the fork? Sorry, I didn’t follow up on that

author: agnxsh
content: yeah

author: hangleang.eth
content: I don’t think we have the depreciation mechanism, we only can prioritize the preferred version

author: agnxsh
content: yeah in that case, just make sure to req /2 after fulu

author: agnxsh
content: don't need to deprecate serving i guess, we haven't as well

author: agnxsh
content: because our libp2p layer doesn't know what forks are

author: pawandhananjay
content: Yeah we don't have any logic to deprecate support right after the fork. Its not required as the priority is higher for v2

author: agnxsh
content: Okay
